snippet.title: Rise Flight
snippet.description:
Reentry from TAC to Deois
http://rise.unistellar.com/
This was recorded an age ago, before Sigourney Weaver.  I miss this game.  There's nothing quite like hurtling across the sky at 5+ KM per second, burning re-entry, a close knit community of cooperative players, and a developer who would listen to his players and implement new ideas in a matter of days if not hours.  Hey Jason, can I get a landing gear indicator on the instrument panel?  Done.  Hey Jason, can I get distances in great arcs?  Done.  Hey Jason, can we get a collision avoidance system?  Done.
